quote_first: As you know, we're on twenty-four hour call and I got here at
quote_last: . We decided to start the investigation at once. The undertakers will collect the body as soon as you've finished.
quote_raw: As you know, we're on twenty-four hour call and I got here at seven twenty-eight. We decided to start the investigation at once. The undertakers will collect the body as soon as you've finished.
title: The Murder Room
author: P.D. James

quote_first: It says here that you called your mother at
quote_last:
p.m. this evening.
"There's some sort of mistake. I didn't get the chance to call anyone."
quote_raw:
It says here that you called your mother at 7:28 p.m. this evening.
"There's some sort of mistake. I didn't get the chance to call anyone."
title: Superior Justice
author: Tom Hilpert
